fact_check_explanation_title: How valuable is Bombardier to the economy of Northern Ireland?
fact_check_explanation_summary: Bombardier is a significant part of the Northern Irish economy but we’ve seen no evidence that it’s worth a full 10% of GDP.
Unemployment in the UK was at 4.3% between May and July 2017.

fact_check_explanation_title: How many women leave Northern Ireland to have an abortion in Britain?
fact_check_explanation_summary: Around 4,000 women living in Ireland and Northern Ireland came to England and Wales for an abortion in 2016.

fact_check_explanation_title: Abortions in court in Northern Ireland
fact_check_explanation_summary: Abortion is banned in Northern Ireland except to protect the health of the mother. Campaigners have been trying to change the law.

fact_check_explanation_title: 60% of Northern Ireland’s exports go to the rest of the UK
fact_check_explanation_summary: Correct that 60% of all sales from Northern Ireland went to Great Britain in 2015.

fact_check_explanation_title: Is Universal Credit leading to rent arrears?
fact_check_explanation_summary: Half of council tenants in 105 councils are one month behind in rent, according to research by the Observer.

fact_check_explanation_title: Were 1.4 million stuck on out-of-work benefits under Labour?
fact_check_explanation_summary: According to 2010 research by the Department for Work and Pensions, 1.4 million people were on out of work benefits in nine of the last ten years.

fact_check_explanation_title: Is Universal Credit being paid on time?
fact_check_explanation_summary: The percentage of people receiving their first universal credit payment within five or six weeks has increased since January.
Junior doctors make up almost half of all doctors in hospitals in England, and can have up to ten years of practical medical experience.

fact_check_explanation_title: Are British businesses struggling with recruitment?
fact_check_explanation_summary: 52% of businesses surveyed by Lloyd’s Bank in June were struggling to recruit skilled labour.

fact_check_explanation_title: How old is the average Conservative Party member?
fact_check_explanation_summary: It’s almost impossible to know exactly what the Conservative membership's average age is, but 57 is probably the best guess for now.

fact_check_explanation_title: Who's right on disadvantaged young people at university?
fact_check_explanation_summary: Most recent data suggests disadvantaged students may be beginning to lose ground in higher education - but it's too soon to read too much into it.
